directions: In a large saucepan or wok over medium heat, combine chicken, onion, carrot, celery, peppercorns, bay leaf, salt, pepper and water.  Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes.  Strain stock and reserve chicken.
Return strained stock to pot and stir in creamed corn.  Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes.  Shred cooked chicken meat and stir into pot.  Heat through.
ingredients: 1 (2 to 3 pound) whole chicken, skin removed and cut into pieces
title: Corn and Chicken Soup
